alert.note: Alert for Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 10:37PM PDT until August 21 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT MONDAY FOR VENTURA COUNTY... At 1037 PM PDT, local law enforcement reported flash flooding across the warned area. Heavy rain has ended, showers may still occur but the main threat is flooding and mudslides due to runoff. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen previously. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Oxnard, Thousand Oaks, Simi Valley, Ventura, Camarillo, Fillmore, western Malibu, Ojai, Chatsworth, Moorpark, Santa Paula, Port Hueneme, Newbury Park, Point Mugu, Lockwood Valley, and Oak Park. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
